                             byte[] avatar)
                      throws UsersClientException
        Update the avatar of a particular user
        Specified by:
        updateUserAvatar in interface UsersClient
        Parameters:
        userId - User ID as a decimal integer (required)
        avatar - user image. Should be less then 2MB.
        Throws:
        UsersClientException - if fails to make the avatar update
